content: I have completed all 15 exercises from chapter 4. For problem 8, I used the substitution method because it seemed most straightforward with the given equations.
feedback: Great work on most problems! Check your algebra on problems 12 and 14.

content: The Industrial Revolution fundamentally transformed society by introducing mass production, urbanization, and new social classes...
feedback: Well-researched essay with good analysis. Consider strengthening your conclusion.

content: Completed all exercises. Had trouble with word problems 10 and 13, but I think I got the right approach.
